author: Yamagishi Kazutoshi
description: Supabase database type definitions for ykzts applications
name: @ykzts/supabase

scripts.typegen: command -v supabase >/dev/null 2>&1 && { supabase gen types typescript --local > src/database.types.ts.tmp && mv src/database.types.ts.tmp src/database.types.ts; } || echo 'Skipping typegen: Supabase CLI not installed (types are already committed)'
